p: From the results depicted in Table 4, polyphenols were moderately present; alkaloids, anthraquinones, saponins, flavonoids, cardiac glycosides, steroids, xanthropoteic amino acids, anthrocyanidins and fat and oils were present, while tannins were absent. Only AECR was considered, because as an edible vegetable, water is generally being used in preparation for consumption.
